data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (active_applications IS NULL OR active_applications < maximum_active_applications) AND (buffer_pool_data_hit_ratio IS NULL OR buffer_pool_data_hit_ratio > 85) AND (current_size IS NULL OR current_size < allocated_size) AND (deadlocks_rate IS NULL OR deadlocks_rate < 1) AND (lock_timeouts_rate IS NULL OR lock_timeouts_rate < 1) AND (log_space_utilization IS NULL OR log_space_utilization < 85) AND (percentage_of_applications_waiting_on_locks IS NULL OR percentage_of_applications_waiting_on_locks < 15)) AS 'Health Score' FROM ibm_db2_database FACET ibm_db2_database_name
SELECT uniqueCount(ibm_db2_database_name) AS 'Databases' FROM ibm_db2_database FACET status
SELECT average(buffer_pool_data_hit_ratio) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(deadlocks_rate) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(current_size) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(allocated_size) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(lock_timeouts_rate) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(log_space_utilization) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(active_applications) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(maximum_active_applications) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(percentage_of_applications_waiting_on_locks) FROM ibm_db2_database COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Percentage of Applications Waiting on Locks (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of Applications Waiting on Locks
